question: Hiralal Yadav, who recently died, was associated with which of the following field?
explanation: Hiralal Yadav was a renowned folk singer who belongs from Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. He was awarded Padma Shri in 2019 by the Government of India. He was awarded Yash Bharti Award in the year 2015 by the Government of Uttar Pradesh. He was awarded Tagore Akademi Award in the year 2011 by the Sangeet Natak Akademi and won Sangeet Natak Akademi Award in 1993-94.
